DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion 1 . All patient must sign informed consent 2 . Diagnosis COPD specific spirometric criterion ( determine study visit ) 3 . Age > = 40 year 4 . Medical Research Council Dyspnoea score > = 2 5 . Current exsmoker > = 10 packyear smoke history 6 . Ability exercise treadmill Exclusion criterion 1 . Significant disease COPD history lifethreatening pulmonary obstruction , thoracotomy pulmonary resection , interstitial lung disease , CF , pulmonary thromboembolic disease , clinically evident bronchiectasis , active tuberculosis , know moderate severe renal impairment 2 . Clinical history asthma 3 . Use supplemental oxygen therapy 4 . Respiratory tract infection COPD exacerbation 6 week prior Visit 1 washout period prior Visit 3 ( may randomize 6 week recovery ) 5 . Recent history ( < = 12 month ) myocardial infarction 6 . Unstable lifethreatening cardiac arrhythmia 7 . Malignancy treat radiation therapy chemotherapy last 5 year 8 . Pregnant nursing woman 9 . Known hypersensitivity anticholinergic drug component study medication 10 . Participation pulmonary cardiac rehab program within 13 week Visit 1 11 . Estimated life expectancy < 2 year 12 . Symptomatic prostatic hyperplasia bladder neck obstruction 13 . Known narrowangle glaucoma 14 . Any condition contraindicate exercise 15 . Orthopaedic , muscular , neurological cardiac disease would interfere regular participation aerobic exercise exercise test 16 . Body mass index < 18 kg/m2 > 35 kg/m2 list truncate space
